QuestData.Title: The End of the Exarch
QuestData.Description: Exarch Maladaar performs his unholy work in the deepest part of the crypts. He poses a threat to both of our worlds if he is not stopped.$B$BYou must slay him for the benefit of us all, dead and alive.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: It is time for him to pay.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Exarch Maladaar and return to the Draenei Spirit inside the Auchenai Crypts.
QuestData.RewardText: You have done our realm a great service. You will not be forgotten.
